0101110000100110 1010010101110101 0 -> sum: 0000000110011011, cout: 1
0010000001011011 0110001110000011 0 -> sum: 1000001111011110, cout: 0
0100111001011001 1111000011000110 1 -> sum: 0011111100100000, cout: 1
1100100001111011 1001000001010100 1 -> sum: 0101100011010000, cout: 1
1101001011110010 0110111100111000 0 -> sum: 0100001000101010, cout: 1
0110101101001000 1110011110001100 0 -> sum: 0101001011010100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
